channel.title: That MLOps Guy
channel.description: Recent content on That MLOps Guy

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I’m a python developer by trade, so let’s say hello in python! print("Hello World")

item.title: About
item.description: This is the place where I share my thoughts and notes about things that I’m excited about and working on and hope to connect with people having a similar mindset. I’d love to hear from you! About Me I have worked for 3+ years as Data Scientist, eventually finding my true calling in DevOps and MLOps. Currently I am a cloud engineer working from Portugal. On this page you can find some information about me and a few blog posts I wrote.

item.title: Uses
item.description: Inspired of many pages out there, I’ve put together this page that covers some parts of my setup. Development IDE: VSCode shell: zsh with oh-my-zsh Miscellaneous Firefox (Extensions: ublock Origin) Signal Messenger App Curious about other uses pages? Check out uses.tech.
